tool.name: SAGA.ta_hydrology.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False isArraySINKROUTE False isArrayWEIGHTS False isArrayVAL_INPUT False isArrayACCU_MATERIAL False isArrayACCU_TARGET False isArrayTARGETS False output_data_FLOW $output_data_FLOW output_data_VAL_MEAN $output_data_VAL_MEAN output_data_ACCU_TOTAL $output_data_ACCU_TOTAL output_data_ACCU_LEFT $output_data_ACCU_LEFT output_data_ACCU_RIGHT $output_data_ACCU_RIGHT output_data_FLOW_LENGTH $output_data_FLOW_LENGTH output_data_WEIGHT_LOSS $output_data_WEIGHT_LOSS name SAGA.ta_hydrology.1 ELEVATION $ELEVATION SINKROUTE $SINKROUTE WEIGHTS $WEIGHTS VAL_INPUT $VAL_INPUT ACCU_MATERIAL $ACCU_MATERIAL ACCU_TARGET $ACCU_TARGET FLOW_UNIT $FLOW_UNIT TARGETS $TARGETS METHOD $METHOD CONVERGENCE $CONVERGENCE NO_NEGATIVES $NO_NEGATIVES prefer $prefer response $response outputType_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.outputType_FLOW transmissionMode_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.transmissionMode_FLOW outputType_VAL_MEAN $OutputSection_VAL_MEAN.outputType_VAL_MEAN transmissionMode_VAL_MEAN $OutputSection_VAL_MEAN.transmissionMode_VAL_MEAN outputType_ACCU_TOTAL $OutputSection_ACCU_TOTAL.outputType_ACCU_TOTAL transmissionMode_ACCU_TOTAL $OutputSection_ACCU_TOTAL.transmissionMode_ACCU_TOTAL outputType_ACCU_LEFT $OutputSection_ACCU_LEFT.outputType_ACCU_LEFT transmissionMode_ACCU_LEFT $OutputSection_ACCU_LEFT.transmissionMode_ACCU_LEFT outputType_ACCU_RIGHT $OutputSection_ACCU_RIGHT.outputType_ACCU_RIGHT transmissionMode_ACCU_RIGHT $OutputSection_ACCU_RIGHT.transmissionMode_ACCU_RIGHT outputType_FLOW_LENGTH $OutputSection_FLOW_LENGTH.outputType_FLOW_LENGTH transmissionMode_FLOW_LENGTH $OutputSection_FLOW_LENGTH.transmissionMode_FLOW_LENGTH outputType_WEIGHT_LOSS $OutputSection_WEIGHT_LOSS.outputType_WEIGHT_LOSS transmissionMode_WEIGHT_LOSS $OutputSection_WEIGHT_LOSS.transmissionMode_WEIGHT_LOSS

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: SINKROUTE
param.label: Sink Routes
param.help: Sink Routes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: WEIGHTS
param.label: Weights
param.help: Weights The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: VAL_INPUT
param.label: Input for Mean over Catchment
param.help: Input for Mean over Catchment The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: ACCU_MATERIAL
param.label: Material for Accumulation
param.help: Material for Accumulation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: ACCU_TARGET
param.label: Accumulation Target
param.help: Accumulation Target The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: TARGETS
param.label: Target Areas
param.help: Target Areas The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: CONVERGENCE
param.label: Convergence
param.help: Convergence factor for Multiple Flow Direction Algorithm (Freeman 1991)

param.name: NO_NEGATIVES
param.label: Prevent Negative Flow Accumulation
param.help: when using weights: do not transport negative flow, set it to zero instead; useful e.g. when accumulating measures of water balance.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_FLOW
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_FLOW
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_VAL_MEAN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_VAL_MEAN
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_ACCU_TOTAL
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_ACCU_TOTAL
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_ACCU_LEFT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_ACCU_LEFT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_ACCU_RIGHT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_ACCU_RIGHT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_FLOW_LENGTH
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_FLOW_LENGTH
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_WEIGHT_LOSS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_WEIGHT_LOSS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Recursive upward processing of cells for calculation of flow accumulation and related parameters. This set of algorithms processes recursively all upwards connected cells until each cell of the DEM has been processed.<br/><br/>Flow routing methods provided by this tool:<ul><li>Deterministic 8 (aka D8, O'Callaghan & Mark 1984)</li><li>Rho 8 (Fairfield & Leymarie 1991)</li><li>Multiple Flow Direction (Freeman 1991, Quinn et al. 1991)</li><li>Deterministic Infinity (Tarboton 1997)</li></ul>
